  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AvailableBattlesScreen
    A screen to display the selection of enemy trainer to battle
    BattleScreen
    A screen to display the battle and all the fancy actions
    EndScreen
    A screen to display end game result
    GUI
    The GUI class manager to handle window navigation and closing
    InventoryScreen
    A screen to display the user inventory and allow user to interact with them
    ItemShopScreen
    A screen to allow user to purchase items from the shop
    MainMenuScreen
    A screen to show all the current day properties, navigate to party, inventory, and shop, select a battle, and sleep
    MonsterShopScreen
    A screen to allow user to purchase monsters from the shop
    PartyScreen
    A screen to prompt user with their party and allow them to move and sell theirs monster
    Screen
    A interface for all the GUI Window Screen
    SettingsScreen
    A screen as part of the setup process to prompt user to select difficulty and choose the amount of days for the game
    StartingMonsterScreen
    A screen as part of the setup process to prompt the user with a selection of monster to start with
    TitleScreen
    A screen as part of the setup process to prompt user with their name
